[`class HKAudiogramSensitivityPointClampingRange`](/documentation/healthkit/hkaudiogramsensitivitypointclampingrange)Defines the range within which an earâ€™s sensitivity point may have been clamped, if any.[`class HKAudiogramSensitivityTest`](/documentation/healthkit/hkaudiogramsensitivitytest)[`class HKBiologicalSexObject`](/documentation/healthkit/hkbiologicalsexobject)This class acts as a wrapper for the [`HKBiologicalSex`](/documentation/healthkit/hkbiologicalsex) enumeration.[`class HKBloodTypeObject`](/documentation/healthkit/hkbloodtypeobject)This class acts as a wrapper for the [`HKBloodType`](/documentation/healthkit/hkbloodtype) enumeration.[`class HKFitzpatrickSkinTypeObject`](/documentation/healthkit/hkfitzpatrickskintypeobject)This class acts as a wrapper for the [`HKFitzpatrickSkinType`](/documentation/healthkit/hkfitzpatrickskintype) enumeration.[`class HKGAD7Assessment`](/documentation/healthkit/hkgad7assessment)[`class HKPHQ9Assessment`](/documentation/healthkit/hkphq9assessment)[`class HKScoredAssessment`](/documentation/healthkit/hkscoredassessment)[`class HKScoredAssessmentType`](/documentation/healthkit/hkscoredassessmenttype)[`class HKStateOfMind`](/documentation/healthkit/hkstateofmind)[`class HKStateOfMindType`](/documentation/healthkit/hkstateofmindtype)[`class HKWheelchairUseObject`](/documentation/healthkit/hkwheelchairuseobject)This class acts as a wrapper for the wheelchair use enumeration.## [See Also](/documentation/healthkit/healthkit-classes#see-also)
